The thresholds that are considered a limit in this application correspond to those defined in the European Directive 2008/50/EC and its corresponding implementation in Royal Decree 102/2011. As a quick summary and guidance. They are reflected in the following table but for a thorough and rigorous inquiry you can download and view the texts of both standards in PDF.

Speed limit of 70 km/h in the M-30 and on the access roads to Madrid, covered inside the M-40.
Vehicle parking ban in SER places in the interior of M-30.

Restriction of circulation within the central zone (inner area of the M-30) of 50% of all vehicles (even days may move vehicles with number plates end in even numbers and odd days those vehicles whose number plates ends in odd number).
Restriction of free movement of taxis, except ecotaxis and Eurotaxis, inside the central zone (inner area of the M-30).

Restriction of circulation within the central zone including M-30 of 50% of all vehicles (even days may move vehicles with number plates end in even numbers and odd days those vehicles whose number plates ends in odd number).
